Summary: Using IR webcam taped to 10X binoculars, observed UFO speeding off
divs: Sighting DetailsI was observing the sky with a near infrared webcam, taped to a 10X pair of binoculars, when I observed a UFO. The UFO appeared to react to my observation of it, but immediately speeding off into the clouds (which is eerie, but I was outside on the deck, and obviously it could see me).
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
